content.heroIntro:
Welcome to BAHIA HOMES HORADADA 3, an exclusive residential development in the heart of paraque Andromeda, Vera, Alicante. This carefully curated collection of 2-bedroom bungalows represents the perfect blend of contemporary design, quality construction, and strategic location. Developed by the trusted BAHIA HOMES, known for delivering exceptional properties throughout the Costa Blanca region, this project offers discerning buyers an opportunity to invest in one of Spain's most sought-after coastal areas at compelling prices.

Each bungalow is thoughtfully designed with modern specifications, offering 72m² of beautifully appointed living space. Starting from just €298,500, BAHIA HOMES HORADADA 3 provides exceptional value, positioned 40% below comparable Spanish island markets. With delivery scheduled for July 2026, this development caters to both lifestyle buyers seeking a Mediterranean home and savvy investors recognizing the +8% year-on-year appreciation trend in the Vera market.

The development's location in paraque Andromeda places residents within reach of world-class beaches, championship golf courses, and a vibrant international community where English is widely spoken. This is more than a property purchase—it's an investment in a lifestyle, backed by proven developer expertise and strong market fundamentals.

locationSection.intro: Vera has emerged as one of the Costa Blanca's most dynamic residential destinations, attracting an established and welcoming international community. Situated in the province of Alicante, this charming coastal town combines authentic Spanish character with modern amenities essential for contemporary living. The paraque Andromeda location offers an ideal balance—close enough to major urban conveniences, yet removed from over-development and tourist congestion. The area is characterized by Mediterranean climate, excellent infrastructure, and a cosmopolitan atmosphere where English is commonly spoken. Vera's popularity among expat communities reflects its combination of affordability, lifestyle quality, and investment potential. Property values here consistently outperform expectations, with the region experiencing strong rental demand from holiday-makers and long-term residents alike. The town center offers diverse shopping, dining, and cultural experiences, while nature lovers appreciate proximity to pristine coastline and golf destinations.
